name: Enigmail
description: Enigmail is a data encryption and decryption extension for Mozilla Thunderbird that provides OpenPGP public key e-mail encryption and signing. Enigmail works under Microsoft Windows, Unix-like, and Mac OS operating systems.

name: TrueCrypt
description: TrueCrypt is a freeware application used for on-the-fly encryption (OTFE). It can create a virtual encrypted disk within a file or encrypt a partition or the entire storage device.
